param.value: <updateObjectRequest><tasks><task name="updateProperty"><parameters><param name="propertyType" value="query"/><param name="propertyValue"><sql>select g.kpi_structure_id ,kpi_structure_name ,count_kpi ,kpi_type_short_name ,avg_score_kpi ,avg_score_kpi_structure_id ,kpi_structure_id_threshold_name from ( select kr.kpi_structure_id ,kpi_group_short_name ,kpi_level_name ,th_month_name ,kr.kpi_structure_name ,count(kpi_id) as count_kpi ,ROUND(sum(score)/count(kpi_id),2) as avg_score_kpi_structure_id ,(select threshold_name from threshold where academic_year = 2558 and kpi_level_id = 1 and begin_threshold <= sum(score)/count(kpi_id) and end_threshold >= sum(score)/count(kpi_id) ) as kpi_structure_id_threshold_name from kpi_result kr inner join sys_month sm on sm.month_id = kr.month_id where kr.academic_year = 2558 and sm.academic_month_no = 1 and kr.kpi_group_id = 1 and kr.kpi_level_id = 1 and kr.org_id = 1 group by kr.kpi_structure_id ,kr.kpi_structure_name )g left join ( select kskt.kpi_structure_id ,kskt.kpi_type_id ,kskt.kpi_type_short_name ,coalesce(avg_score_kpi, 0) as avg_score_kpi from( select ks.kpi_structure_id , ks.kpi_structure_name , kt.kpi_type_id , kt.kpi_type_short_name from kpi_type kt, kpi_structure ks where kt.academic_year = 2558 )kskt left join ( select kr.kpi_structure_id ,kr.kpi_type_id ,ROUND(sum(score)/count(kr.kpi_type_id),2) as avg_score_kpi from kpi_result kr, sys_month sm where kr.month_id = sm.month_id and kr.academic_year = 2558 and sm.academic_month_no = 1 and kr.kpi_group_id = 1 and kr.kpi_level_id = 1 and kr.org_id = 1 group by kr.kpi_structure_id ,kr.kpi_type_id ) kpis on kpis.kpi_structure_id = kskt.kpi_structure_id and kpis.kpi_type_id = kskt.kpi_type_id )e on e.kpi_structure_id = g.kpi_structure_id order by g.kpi_structure_id ,kpi_type_id</sql></param><param name="queryType" value="native"/></parameters></task></tasks></updateObjectRequest>

<updateObjectRequest><tasks><task name="updateProperty"><parameters><param name="propertyType" value="query"/><param name="propertyValue"><sql>select kr.kpi_structure_name ,kr.kpi_name ,kpi_uom_name ,target_value ,multiplicand ,denominator as denominatorm ,CASE WHEN criteria_type_id = 2 THEN concat(actual_value,' (',qualitative,')') ELSE actual_value END as val ,score as kpi_score ,kpi_structure_score ,(select avg(score) from kpi_result kr, sys_month sm where kr.month_id = sm.month_id and kr.academic_year = 2558 and sm.academic_month_no = 1 and kr.kpi_group_id = 1 and kr.kpi_level_id = 1 and kr.org_id = 1) as kpi_avg_score from kpi_result kr left join sys_month sm on kr.month_id = sm.month_id left join ( select ksr.kpi_structure_id ,ksr.score as kpi_structure_score from org_structure_result ksr, sys_month sm where ksr.month_id = sm.month_id and ksr.academic_year = 2558 and sm.academic_month_no = 1 and ksr.kpi_group_id = 1 and ksr.kpi_level_id = 1 and ksr.org_id = 1 group by ksr.kpi_structure_id ) kpis on kpis.kpi_structure_id = kr.kpi_structure_id left join ( select kr.result_id , GROUP_CONCAT(running_no ORDER BY running_no SEPARATOR ',') as qualitative from kpi_result kr, sys_month sm, kpi_result_detail kpird, qualitative_criteria qc where kr.month_id = sm.month_id and kr.result_id = kpird.result_id and kpird.criteria_id = qc.criteria_id and kr.academic_year = 2558 and sm.academic_month_no = 1 and kr.kpi_group_id = 1 and kr.kpi_level_id = 1 and kr.org_id = 1 and action_flag = 1 group by kr.result_id )q on q.result_id = kr.result_id where kr.academic_year = 2558 and sm.academic_month_no = 1 and kr.kpi_group_id = 1 and kr.kpi_level_id = 1 and kr.org_id = 1 group by kr.kpi_structure_id ,kr.kpi_structure_name ,kr.kpi_id ,kr.kpi_name order by kr.kpi_structure_id ,kr.kpi_id</sql></param><param name="queryType" value="native"/></parameters></task></tasks></updateObjectRequest>

<updateObjectRequest><tasks><task name="updateProperty"><parameters><param name="propertyType" value="query"/><param name="propertyValue"><sql>select orgsr.academic_year , sys.calendar_month_no , sys.th_month_name , kpi_group_short_name , orgsr.kpi_level_id , orgsr.kpi_level_name , orgsr.org_id , trim(orgsr.org_name) as org_name , orgsr.kpi_structure_id , orgsr.kpi_structure_name , score as score_structure , threshold_name , trim(substr(threshold_name,18,5)) as threshold_short_name , score_org from org_structure_result orgsr , sys_month sys , kpi_group kgro , ( select ore.academic_year , sys.calendar_month_no , org_id , score as score_org from org_result ore, sys_month sys where ore.month_id = sys.month_id ) ore where orgsr.month_id = sys.month_id and orgsr.kpi_group_id = kgro.kpi_group_id and orgsr.academic_year = ore.academic_year and sys.calendar_month_no = ore.calendar_month_no and orgsr.org_id = ore.org_id group by orgsr.kpi_level_id , orgsr.kpi_level_name , orgsr.org_id , orgsr.org_name , orgsr.kpi_structure_id , orgsr.kpi_structure_name</sql></param><param name="queryType" value="cognos"/></parameters></task></tasks></updateObjectRequest>

<updateObjectRequest><tasks><task name="updateProperty"><parameters><param name="propertyType" value="query"/><param name="propertyValue"><sql>select kr.academic_year ,sm.academic_month_no ,sm.th_month_name ,kr.kpi_structure_id ,kr.kpi_structure_name ,kr.kpi_id ,kr.kpi_name ,kr.org_id ,kr.org_name ,kr.kpi_level_id ,kr.kpi_level_name ,kr.kpi_group_id ,kr.kpi_group_name ,kr.kpi_group_short_name ,formula_desc ,calendar_type_name ,period_name ,kpi_uom_name ,benchmark_value ,target_value ,actual_value ,percent_actual_vs_target ,percent_actual_change ,score as kpi_score from kpi_result kr, sys_month sm where kr.month_id = sm.month_id group by kr.academic_year ,sm.academic_month_no ,kr.kpi_structure_id ,kr.kpi_id ,kr.org_id ,kr.kpi_level_id ,kr.kpi_group_id order by kr.academic_year ,sm.academic_month_no ,kr.kpi_group_id ,kr.kpi_level_id ,kr.org_id ,kr.kpi_structure_id ,kr.kpi_id</sql></param><param name="queryType" value="native"/></parameters></task></tasks></updateObjectRequest>

<updateObjectRequest><tasks><task name="updateProperty"><parameters><param name="propertyType" value="query"/><param name="propertyValue"><sql>select kr.academic_year ,sm.academic_month_no ,th_month_name ,kr.kpi_group_id ,kr.kpi_group_name ,kr.kpi_group_short_name ,kr.kpi_structure_id ,kr.kpi_structure_name ,kr.kpi_level_id ,kr.kpi_level_name ,kr.org_id ,kr.org_name ,kr.kpi_id ,kr.kpi_name ,kpi_uom_name ,target_value ,multiplicand ,denominator as denominatorm ,CASE WHEN criteria_type_id = 2 THEN concat(actual_value,' (',qualitative,')') ELSE actual_value END as val ,score as kpi_score ,kpi_structure_score
from kpi_result kr left join sys_month sm on kr.month_id = sm.month_id left join (select ksr.academic_year ,sm.academic_month_no ,ksr.kpi_group_id ,ksr.kpi_level_id ,ksr.org_id ,ksr.kpi_structure_id ,ksr.score as kpi_structure_score from org_structure_result ksr, sys_month sm where ksr.month_id = sm.month_id )orgstr on orgstr.academic_year = kr.academic_year and orgstr.academic_month_no = sm.academic_month_no and orgstr.kpi_group_id = kr.kpi_group_id and orgstr.kpi_level_id = kr.kpi_level_id and orgstr.org_id = kr.org_id and orgstr.kpi_structure_id = kr.kpi_structure_id left join (select kr.academic_year ,academic_month_no ,kpi_group_id ,kpi_level_id ,org_id ,kr.kpi_id , GROUP_CONCAT(running_no ORDER BY running_no SEPARATOR ',') as qualitative from kpi_result kr, sys_month sm, kpi_result_detail kpird, qualitative_criteria qc where kr.month_id = sm.month_id and kr.result_id = kpird.result_id and kpird.criteria_id = qc.criteria_id and action_flag = 1 GROUP BY kr.academic_year ,academic_month_no ,kpi_group_id ,kpi_level_id ,org_id ,kr.kpi_id )kpiqua on kpiqua.academic_year = kr.academic_year and kpiqua.academic_month_no = sm.academic_month_no and kpiqua.kpi_group_id = kr.kpi_group_id and kpiqua.kpi_level_id = kr.kpi_level_id and kpiqua.org_id = kr.org_id and kpiqua.kpi_id = kr.kpi_id order by kr.academic_year ,sm.academic_month_no ,kr.kpi_group_id ,kr.kpi_structure_id ,kr.kpi_level_id ,kr.org_id ,kr.kpi_id
</sql></param><param name="queryType" value="native"/></parameters></task></tasks></updateObjectRequest>

<updateObjectRequest><tasks><task name="updateProperty"><parameters><param name="propertyType" value="query"/><param name="propertyValue"><sql>select g.academic_year ,g.academic_month_no ,th_month_name ,g.kpi_group_id ,kpi_group_short_name ,g.kpi_level_id ,kpi_level_name ,kpi_type_id ,kpi_type_short_name ,g.org_id ,org_name ,university_code ,university_name ,faculty_code ,faculty_name ,course_code ,course_name ,g.kpi_structure_id ,kpi_structure_name ,count_kpi ,avg_score_kpi ,avg_score_kpi_structure_id ,(select threshold_name from threshold where academic_year = g.academic_year and kpi_level_id = g.kpi_level_id and (begin_threshold <= avg_score_kpi_structure_id and end_threshold >= avg_score_kpi_structure_id) ) as kpi_structure_id_threshold_name from ( select kr.academic_year ,sm.academic_month_no ,kr.kpi_group_id ,kr.kpi_level_id ,kr.org_id ,kr.kpi_structure_id ,org.org_name ,university_code ,university_name ,faculty_code ,faculty_name ,course_code ,course_name ,kpi_group_short_name ,kpi_level_name ,th_month_name ,kr.kpi_structure_name ,count(kpi_id) as count_kpi ,ROUND(sum(score)/count(kpi_id),2) as avg_score_kpi_structure_id from kpi_result kr inner join sys_month sm on sm.month_id = kr.month_id inner join org on org.org_id = kr.org_id group by kr.academic_year ,sm.academic_month_no ,kr.kpi_group_id ,kr.kpi_level_id ,kr.org_id ,kr.kpi_structure_id ,org.org_name ,university_code ,university_name ,faculty_code ,faculty_name ,course_code ,course_name ,kpi_group_short_name ,kpi_level_name ,th_month_name ,kr.kpi_structure_name )g left join ( select kskt.academic_year ,kpis.academic_month_no ,kpis.kpi_group_id ,kpis.kpi_level_id ,kpis.org_id ,kskt.kpi_structure_id ,kskt.kpi_type_id ,kskt.kpi_type_short_name ,coalesce(avg_score_kpi, 0) as avg_score_kpi from( select kt.academic_year , ks.kpi_structure_id , ks.kpi_structure_name , kt.kpi_type_id , kt.kpi_type_short_name from kpi_type kt, kpi_structure ks group by kt.academic_year , ks.kpi_structure_id , ks.kpi_structure_name , kt.kpi_type_id , kt.kpi_type_short_name )kskt left join ( select kr.academic_year ,sm.academic_month_no ,kr.kpi_group_id ,kr.kpi_level_id ,kr.org_id ,kr.kpi_structure_id ,kr.kpi_type_id ,ROUND(sum(score)/count(kr.kpi_type_id),2) as avg_score_kpi from kpi_result kr, sys_month sm where kr.month_id = sm.month_id group by kr.academic_year ,sm.academic_month_no ,kr.kpi_group_id ,kr.kpi_level_id ,kr.org_id ,kr.kpi_structure_id ,kr.kpi_type_id ) kpis on kpis.academic_year = kskt.academic_year and kpis.kpi_structure_id = kskt.kpi_structure_id and kpis.kpi_type_id = kskt.kpi_type_id group by kskt.academic_year ,kpis.academic_month_no ,kpis.kpi_group_id ,kpis.kpi_level_id ,kpis.org_id ,kskt.kpi_structure_id ,kskt.kpi_type_id ,kskt.kpi_type_short_name )e on e.academic_year = g.academic_year and e.academic_month_no = g.academic_month_no and e.kpi_group_id = g.kpi_group_id and e.kpi_level_id = g.kpi_level_id and e.org_id = g.org_id and e.kpi_structure_id = g.kpi_structure_id group by g.academic_year ,g.academic_month_no ,th_month_name ,g.kpi_group_id ,kpi_group_short_name ,g.kpi_level_id ,kpi_level_name ,kpi_type_id ,kpi_type_short_name ,g.org_id ,org_name ,university_code ,university_name ,faculty_code ,faculty_name ,course_code ,course_name ,g.kpi_structure_id ,kpi_structure_name ,count_kpi ,avg_score_kpi ,avg_score_kpi_structure_id order by g.academic_year ,g.academic_month_no ,g.kpi_group_id ,g.kpi_level_id ,kpi_type_id ,g.org_id ,g.kpi_structure_id</sql></param><param name="queryType" value="native"/></parameters></task></tasks></updateObjectRequest>

<updateObjectRequest><tasks><task name="updateProperty"><parameters><param name="propertyType" value="query"/><param name="propertyValue"><sql>select academic_year ,academic_month_no ,no_of_month ,evidence_path FROM ( select map.academic_year ,sm.academic_month_no ,per.no_of_month ,kpi.kpi_group_id ,kpi_group_short_name ,kpi.kpi_structure_id ,kpi_structure.kpi_structure_name ,CASE WHEN kpi.calendar_type_id = 1 THEN CASE WHEN per.no_of_month = 1 THEN th_month_name WHEN per.no_of_month = 2 THEN calendar2month WHEN per.no_of_month = 3 THEN calendar3month WHEN per.no_of_month = 4 THEN fiscal4month WHEN per.no_of_month = 5 THEN fiscal5month WHEN per.no_of_month = 6 THEN fiscal6month WHEN per.no_of_month = 7 THEN fiscal2month WHEN per.no_of_month = 8 THEN fiscal3month WHEN per.no_of_month = 9 THEN fiscal4month WHEN per.no_of_month = 10 THEN fiscal5month WHEN per.no_of_month = 11 THEN fiscal6month WHEN per.no_of_month = 11 THEN fiscal6month END END as caseMonth ,kpi.kpi_level_id ,lv.kpi_level_name ,cdsre.org_id ,org.org_name ,map.kpi_id ,kpi.kpi_name ,cds.cds_name ,map.cds_id as running_no ,evidence_flag ,cds_value ,evidence_path from kpi_cds_mapping map on map.cds_id = cds.cds_id left join cds_result cdsre on cds.cds_id = cdsre.cds_id left join sys_month sm on sm.month_id = cdsre.month_id left join kpi_level lv on kpi.kpi_level_id = lv.kpi_level_id ,course_code ,course_name ,g.kpi_structure_id ,kpi_structure_name ,count_kpi ,avg_score_kpi ,avg_score_kpi_structure_id ,(select threshold_name from threshold where academic_year = g.academic_year and kpi_level_id = g.kpi_level_id and (begin_threshold <= avg_score_kpi_structure_id and end_threshold >= avg_score_kpi_structure_id) ) as kpi_structure_id_threshold_name from ( select kr.academic_year ,sm.academic_month_no ,kr.kpi_group_id ,kr.kpi_level_id ,kr.org_id ,kr.kpi_structure_id ,org.org_name ,university_code ,university_name ,faculty_code ,faculty_name ,course_code ,course_name ,kpi_group_short_name ,kpi_level_name ,th_month_name ,kr.kpi_structure_name ,count(kpi_id) as count_kpi ,ROUND(sum(score)/count(kpi_id),2) as avg_score_kpi_structure_id from kpi_result kr inner join sys_month sm on sm.month_id = kr.month_id inner join org on org.org_id = kr.org_id group by kr.academic_year ,sm.academic_month_no ,kr.kpi_group_id ,kr.kpi_level_id ,kr.org_id ,kr.kpi_structure_id ,org.org_name ,university_code ,university_name ,faculty_code ,faculty_name ,course_code ,course_name ,kpi_group_short_name ,kpi_level_name ,th_month_name ,kr.kpi_structure_name )g left join ( select kskt.academic_year ,kpis.academic_month_no ,kpis.kpi_group_id ,kpis.kpi_level_id ,kpis.org_id ,kskt.kpi_structure_id ,kskt.kpi_type_id ,kskt.kpi_type_short_name ,coalesce(avg_score_kpi, 0) as avg_score_kpi from( select kt.academic_year , ks.kpi_structure_id , ks.kpi_structure_name , kt.kpi_type_id , kt.kpi_type_short_name from kpi_type kt, kpi_structure ks group by kt.academic_year , ,sm.academic_month_no ,kr.kpi_group_id ,kr.kpi_level_id ,kr.org_id ,kr.kpi_structure_id ,kr.kpi_type_id ) kpis on kpis.academic_year = kskt.academic_year and kpis.kpi_structure_id = g.kpi_level_id and e.org_id = g.org_id and e.kpi_structure_id = g.kpi_structure_id group by g.academic_year ,g.academic_month_no ,th_month_name ,g.kpi_group_id ,kpi_group_short_name ,g.kpi_level_id kr.month_id = sm.month_id left join (select ksr.academic_year ,sm.academic_month_no ,ksr.kpi_group_id ,ksr.kpi_level_id ,ksr.org_id ,ksr.kpi_structure_id ,ksr.score as kpi_structure_score from <updateObjectRequest><tasks><task name="updateProperty"><parameters><param name="propertyType" value="query"/><param name="propertyValue"><sql>select academic_year ,academic_month_no ,th_month_name ,running_no ,evidence_flag ,cds_value ,evidence_path ,row_type FROM ( select map.academic_year ,sm.academic_month_no ,th_month_name ,per.no_of_month ,kpi.kpi_group_id ,kpi_group_short_name ,kpi.kpi_structure_id ,kpi_structure.kpi_structure_name ,CASE WHEN kpi.calendar_type_id = 1 THEN CASE WHEN per.no_of_month = 1 THEN th_month_name WHEN per.no_of_month = 2 THEN calendar2month WHEN per.no_of_month = 3 THEN calendar3month WHEN per.no_of_month = 4 THEN calendar4month WHEN per.no_of_month = 5 THEN calendar5month WHEN per.no_of_month = 6 THEN calendar6month WHEN per.no_of_month = 7 THEN calendar2month WHEN per.no_of_month = 8 THEN calendar3month WHEN per.no_of_month = 9 THEN calendar4month WHEN per.no_of_month = 10 THEN calendar5month WHEN per.no_of_month = 11 THEN calendar6month WHEN per.no_of_month = 11 THEN calendar6month END WHEN kpi.calendar_type_id = 2 THEN CASE WHEN per.no_of_month = 1 THEN th_month_name WHEN per.no_of_month = 2 THEN academic2month WHEN per.no_of_month = 3 THEN academic3month WHEN per.no_of_month = 4 THEN academic4month WHEN per.no_of_month = 5 THEN academic5month WHEN per.no_of_month = 6 THEN academic6month WHEN per.no_of_month = 7 THEN academic2month WHEN per.no_of_month = 8 THEN academic3month WHEN per.no_of_month = 9 THEN academic4month WHEN per.no_of_month = 10 THEN academic5month WHEN per.no_of_month = 11 THEN academic6month WHEN per.no_of_month = 11 THEN academic6month END WHEN kpi.calendar_type_id = 3 THEN CASE WHEN per.no_of_month = 1 THEN th_month_name WHEN per.no_of_month = 2 THEN fiscal2month WHEN fiscal2month WHEN per.no_of_month = 8 THEN fiscal3month WHEN per.no_of_month = 9 THEN fiscal4month WHEN per.no_of_month = 10 THEN fiscal5month WHEN per.no_of_month = 11 THEN fiscal6month WHEN per.no_of_month = 11 THEN fiscal6month END END as caseMonth ,kpi.kpi_level_id ,lv.kpi_level_name ,cdsre.org_id ,org.org_name ,map.kpi_id ,kpi.kpi_name ,cds.cds_name ,support_data_name ,map.cds_id as running_no ,evidence_flag ,cds_value ,evidence_path ,row_type from kpi_cds_mapping map left join kpi on map.kpi_id = kpi.kpi_id left join kpi_group on kpi_group.kpi_group_id = kpi.kpi_group_id left join kpi_structure on kpi_structure.kpi_structure_id = kpi.kpi_structure_id left join cds on map.cds_id = cds.cds_id left join cds_result cdsre on cds.cds_id = cdsre.cds_id left join sys_month sm on sm.month_id = cdsre.month_id left join kpi_level lv on kpi.kpi_level_id = lv.kpi_level_id left join org on org.org_id = cdsre.org_id left join cds_result_detail cdsrede on cdsrede.result_id = cdsre.result_id left join cds_evidence cdev on cdev.result_detail_id = cdsrede.result_detail_id left join period per on per.period_id = kpi.period_id

cdsrede.result_id = cdsre.result_id left join cds_evidence cdev on cdev.result_detail_id = cdsrede.result_detail_id left join period per on per.period_id = kpi.period_id

<updateObjectRequest><tasks><task name="updateProperty"><parameters><param name="propertyType" value="query"/><param name="propertyValue"><sql>select g.calendar_type_id ,g.calendar_type_name ,g.calendar_year ,g.academic_year ,g.fiscal_year ,g.calendar_month_no ,g.academic_month_no ,g.fiscal_month_no ,g.th_month_name ,g.kpi_group_id ,g.kpi_group_short_name ,g.kpi_level_id ,g.kpi_level_name ,e.kpi_type_id ,e.kpi_type_short_name ,g.path ,g.org_id ,g.org_name ,g.university_code ,g.university_name ,CASE WHEN g.kpi_level_id = 1 THEN university_code ELSE faculty_code END as faculty_code ,CASE WHEN g.kpi_level_id = 1 THEN university_name ELSE faculty_name END as faculty_name ,g.course_code ,g.course_name ,g.kpi_structure_id ,g.kpi_structure_name ,g.count_kpi ,g.score_criteria_flag ,CASE WHEN g.score_criteria_flag = 0 THEN null ELSE e.avg_score_kpi END as avg_score_kpi ,CASE WHEN g.score_criteria_flag = 0 THEN null ELSE g.avg_score_kpi_structure_id END as avg_score_kpi_structure_id ,CASE WHEN g.score_criteria_flag = 0 THEN case WHEN g.avg_score_kpi_structure_id = 5 THEN 'หลักสูตรได้มาตรฐาน' ELSE 'หลักสูตรไม่ได้มาตรฐาน' END ELSE (select threshold_name from threshold where academic_year = g.academic_year and kpi_level_id = g.kpi_level_id and (begin_threshold <= g.avg_score_kpi_structure_id and end_threshold >= g.avg_score_kpi_structure_id) ) END as kpi_structure_id_threshold_name from ( select kr.month_id ,kpi.calendar_type_id ,kr.calendar_type_name ,sm.calendar_year ,sm.academic_year ,sm.fiscal_year ,sm.calendar_month_no ,sm.academic_month_no ,sm.fiscal_month_no ,sm.th_month_name ,kr.kpi_group_id ,kr.kpi_level_id ,kr.org_id ,kr.kpi_structure_id ,org.path ,org.org_name ,org.university_code ,org.university_name ,org.faculty_code ,org.faculty_name ,org.course_code ,org.course_name ,kr.kpi_group_short_name ,kr.kpi_level_name ,kr.kpi_structure_name ,kpi.score_criteria_flag ,count(kr.kpi_id) as count_kpi ,ROUND(sum(kr.score)/count(kr.kpi_id),2) as avg_score_kpi_structure_id from kpi_result kr inner join sys_month sm on sm.month_id = kr.month_id inner join org on org.org_id = kr.org_id inner join kpi on kpi.kpi_id = kr.kpi_id group by kr.month_id ,kpi.calendar_type_id ,kr.calendar_type_name ,sm.calendar_year ,sm.academic_year ,sm.fiscal_year ,sm.calendar_month_no ,sm.academic_month_no ,sm.fiscal_month_no ,sm.th_month_name ,kr.kpi_group_id ,kr.kpi_level_id ,kr.org_id ,kr.kpi_structure_id ,org.path ,org.org_name ,org.university_code ,org.university_name ,org.faculty_code ,org.faculty_name ,org.course_code ,org.course_name ,kr.kpi_group_short_name ,kr.kpi_level_name ,kr.kpi_structure_name ,kpi.score_criteria_flag )g left join ( select kpis.month_id ,kpis.kpi_group_id ,kpis.kpi_level_id ,kpis.org_id ,kskt.kpi_structure_id ,kskt.kpi_type_id ,kskt.kpi_type_short_name ,coalesce(avg_score_kpi, 0) as avg_score_kpi from( select ks.kpi_structure_id , ks.kpi_structure_name , kt.kpi_type_id , kt.kpi_type_short_name from kpi_type kt, kpi_structure ks group by ks.kpi_structure_id , ks.kpi_structure_name , kt.kpi_type_id , kt.kpi_type_short_name )kskt left join ( select kr.month_id ,kr.kpi_group_id ,kr.kpi_level_id ,kr.org_id ,kr.kpi_structure_id ,kr.kpi_type_id ,ROUND(sum(score)/count(kr.kpi_type_id),2) as avg_score_kpi from kpi_result kr group by kr.month_id ,kr.kpi_group_id ,kr.kpi_level_id ,kr.org_id ,kr.kpi_structure_id ,kr.kpi_type_id ) kpis on kpis.kpi_structure_id = kskt.kpi_structure_id and kpis.kpi_type_id = kskt.kpi_type_id group by kpis.month_id ,kpis.kpi_group_id ,kpis.kpi_level_id ,kpis.org_id ,kskt.kpi_structure_id ,kskt.kpi_type_id ,kskt.kpi_type_short_name )e on e.month_id = g.month_id and e.kpi_group_id = g.kpi_group_id and e.kpi_level_id = g.kpi_level_id and e.org_id = g.org_id and e.kpi_structure_id = g.kpi_structure_id group by g.calendar_type_id ,g.calendar_type_name ,g.calendar_year ,g.academic_year ,g.fiscal_year ,g.calendar_month_no ,g.academic_month_no ,g.fiscal_month_no ,g.th_month_name ,g.kpi_group_id ,g.kpi_group_short_name ,g.kpi_level_id ,g.kpi_level_name ,e.kpi_type_id ,e.kpi_type_short_name ,g.path ,g.org_id ,g.org_name ,g.university_code ,g.university_name ,CASE WHEN g.kpi_level_id = 1 THEN university_code ELSE faculty_code END ,CASE WHEN g.kpi_level_id = 1 THEN university_name ELSE faculty_name END ,g.course_code ,g.course_name ,g.kpi_structure_id ,g.kpi_structure_name ,g.count_kpi ,g.score_criteria_flag</sql></param><param name="queryType" value="native"/></parameters></task></tasks></updateObjectRequest>

<updateObjectRequest><tasks><task name="updateProperty"><parameters><param name="propertyType" value="query"/><param name="propertyValue"><sql>select kr.month_id ,kpi.calendar_type_id ,kr.calendar_type_name ,sm.calendar_year ,sm.academic_year ,sm.fiscal_year ,sm.calendar_month_no ,sm.academic_month_no ,sm.fiscal_month_no ,sm.th_month_name ,kr.kpi_group_id ,kr.kpi_level_id ,kr.org_id ,kr.org_name ,org.university_code ,org.university_name ,org.faculty_code ,org.faculty_name ,org.course_code ,org.course_name ,CASE WHEN kr.kpi_level_id = 3 THEN 2 ELSE 1 END as kpi_structure_mis ,count(DISTINCT kr.kpi_structure_id) as kpi_structure_max from kpi_result kr inner join sys_month sm on sm.month_id = kr.month_id inner join kpi_structure kpistr on kpistr.kpi_structure_id = kr.kpi_structure_id inner join org on org.org_id = kr.org_id inner join kpi on kpi.kpi_id = kr.kpi_id group by kr.month_id ,kpi.calendar_type_id ,kr.calendar_type_name ,sm.calendar_year ,sm.academic_year ,sm.fiscal_year ,sm.calendar_month_no ,sm.academic_month_no ,sm.fiscal_month_no ,sm.th_month_name ,kr.kpi_group_id ,kr.kpi_level_id ,kr.org_id ,kr.org_name ,org.university_code ,org.university_name ,org.faculty_code ,org.faculty_name ,org.course_code ,org.course_name</sql></param><param name="queryType" value="native"/></parameters></task></tasks></updateObjectRequest>

<updateObjectRequest><tasks><task name="updateProperty"><parameters><param name="propertyType" value="query"/><param name="propertyValue"><sql>select kr.month_id ,kpi.calendar_type_id ,kr.calendar_type_name ,sm.calendar_year ,sm.academic_year ,sm.fiscal_year ,sm.calendar_month_no ,sm.academic_month_no ,sm.fiscal_month_no ,sm.th_month_name ,kr.kpi_group_id ,kr.kpi_group_name ,kr.kpi_group_short_name ,kr.kpi_structure_id ,kr.kpi_structure_name ,kr.kpi_level_id ,kr.kpi_level_name ,org.path ,kr.org_id ,kr.org_name ,org.university_code ,org.university_name ,CASE WHEN kr.kpi_level_id = 1 THEN org.university_code ELSE org.faculty_code END as faculty_code ,CASE WHEN kr.kpi_level_id = 1 THEN org.university_name ELSE org.faculty_name END as faculty_name ,org.course_code ,org.course_name ,kr.kpi_id ,kr.kpi_name ,kr.kpi_uom_name ,kr.target_value ,kr.multiplicand ,kr.denominator as denominatorm ,CASE WHEN kr.criteria_type_id = 2 THEN concat(kr.actual_value,' (',kpiqua.qualitative,')') ELSE kr.actual_value END as val ,kr.score as kpi_score ,orgstr.kpi_structure_score from kpi_result kr inner join org on org.org_id = kr.org_id inner join kpi on kpi.kpi_id = kr.kpi_id inner join sys_month sm on kr.month_id = sm.month_id left join (select ksr.month_id ,ksr.kpi_group_id ,ksr.kpi_level_id ,ksr.org_id ,ksr.kpi_structure_id ,ksr.score as kpi_structure_score from org_structure_result ksr )orgstr on orgstr.month_id = kr.month_id and orgstr.kpi_group_id = kr.kpi_group_id and orgstr.kpi_level_id = kr.kpi_level_id and orgstr.org_id = kr.org_id and orgstr.kpi_structure_id = kr.kpi_structure_id left join (select kr.month_id ,kr.kpi_group_id ,kr.kpi_level_id ,kr.org_id ,kr.kpi_id , GROUP_CONCAT(qc.running_no ORDER BY qc.running_no SEPARATOR ',') as qualitative from kpi_result kr, kpi_result_detail kpird, qualitative_criteria qc where kr.result_id = kpird.result_id and kpird.criteria_id = qc.criteria_id and action_flag = 1 GROUP BY kr.month_id ,kr.kpi_group_id ,kr.kpi_level_id ,kr.org_id ,kr.kpi_id )kpiqua on kpiqua.month_id = kr.month_id and kpiqua.kpi_group_id = kr.kpi_group_id and kpiqua.kpi_level_id = kr.kpi_level_id and kpiqua.org_id = kr.org_id and kpiqua.kpi_id = kr.kpi_id order by kr.month_id ,kr.kpi_group_id ,kr.kpi_structure_id ,kr.kpi_level_id ,kr.org_id ,kr.kpi_id</sql></param><param name="queryType" per.no_of_month = 2 THEN fiscal2month WHEN per.no_of_month = 3 THEN fiscal3month WHEN per.no_of_month = 4 THEN fiscal4month WHEN per.no_of_month = 5 THEN fiscal5month WHEN per.no_of_month = 6 THEN fiscal6month WHEN per.no_of_month = 7 THEN fiscal2month WHEN per.no_of_month = 8 THEN fiscal3month WHEN per.no_of_month = 9 THEN fiscal4month WHEN per.no_of_month = 10 THEN fiscal5month WHEN per.no_of_month = 11 THEN fiscal6month WHEN per.no_of_month = 11 THEN fiscal6month END END as caseMonth ,kpi.kpi_level_id ,lv.kpi_level_name ,cdsre.org_id ,org.org_name ,map.kpi_id ,kpi.kpi_name ,cds.cds_name ,support_data_name ,map.cds_id as running_no ,evidence_flag ,cds_value ,evidence_path ,row_type ,cdev.created_by from kpi_cds_mapping map left join kpi on map.kpi_id = kpi.kpi_id left join kpi_group on kpi_group.kpi_group_id = kpi.kpi_group_id left join kpi_structure on kpi_structure.kpi_structure_id = kpi.kpi_structure_id left join cds on map.cds_id = cds.cds_id left join cds_result cdsre on cds.cds_id = cdsre.cds_id left join sys_month sm on sm.month_id = cdsre.month_id left join kpi_level lv on kpi.kpi_level_id = lv.kpi_level_id left join org on org.org_id = cdsre.org_id left join cds_result_detail cdsrede on cdsrede.result_id = cdsre.result_id left join cds_evidence cdev on cdev.result_detail_id = cdsrede.result_detail_id left join period per on per.period_id = kpi.period_id left join calendar_type ct on ct.calendar_type_id = kpi.calendar_type_id
UNION
select kre.month_id ,kpi.calendar_type_id ,kre.calendar_type_name ,sm.calendar_year ,sm.academic_year ,sm.fiscal_year ,sm.calendar_month_no ,sm.academic_month_no ,sm.fiscal_month_no ,sm.th_month_name ,'' as no_of_month ,kre.kpi_group_id ,kpi_group_short_name ,kre.kpi_structure_id ,kpi_structure_name ,th_month_name as caseMonth ,kre.kpi_level_id ,kre.kpi_level_name ,kre.org_id ,kre.org_name ,kre.kpi_id ,kre.kpi_name ,criteria_desc as cds_name ,'' as support_data_name ,running_no ,evidence_flag ,0 as cds_value ,evidence_path ,null as row_type ,ke.created_by from kpi_result kre, kpi_result_detail kred, qualitative_criteria qc, kpi_evidence ke , sys_month sm , kpi where kre.result_id = kred.result_id and kred.criteria_id = qc.criteria_id and kred.result_detail_id = ke.result_detail_id and kre.month_id = sm.month_id and kpi.kpi_id = kre.kpi_id and kred.action_flag = '1' )g</sql></param><param name="queryType" value="native"/></parameters></task></tasks></updateObjectRequest>

<updateObjectRequest><tasks><task name="updateProperty"><parameters><param name="propertyType" value="query"/><param name="propertyValue"><sql>select kr.month_id ,kpi.calendar_type_id ,kr.calendar_type_name ,sm.calendar_year ,sm.academic_year ,sm.fiscal_year ,sm.calendar_month_no ,sm.academic_month_no ,sm.fiscal_month_no ,sm.th_month_name ,kr.kpi_structure_id ,kr.kpi_structure_name ,kr.kpi_id ,kr.kpi_name ,org.path ,kr.org_id ,kr.org_name ,org.university_code ,org.university_name ,CASE WHEN kr.kpi_level_id = 1 THEN org.university_code ELSE org.faculty_code END as faculty_code ,CASE WHEN kr.kpi_level_id = 1 THEN org.university_name ELSE org.faculty_name END as faculty_name ,org.course_code ,org.course_name ,kr.kpi_level_id ,kr.kpi_level_name ,kr.kpi_group_id ,kr.kpi_group_name ,kr.kpi_group_short_name ,kr.formula_desc ,kr.period_name ,kr.kpi_uom_name ,kr.benchmark_value ,kr.target_value ,kr.actual_value ,kr.percent_actual_vs_target ,kr.percent_actual_change ,kr.score as kpi_score ,kpi.min_score from kpi_result kr, sys_month sm, org , kpi where kr.month_id = sm.month_id and org.org_id = kr.org_id and kpi.kpi_id = kr.kpi_id order by kr.academic_year ,sm.academic_month_no ,kr.kpi_group_id ,kr.kpi_level_id ,kr.org_id ,kr.kpi_structure_id ,kr.kpi_id</sql></param><param name="queryType" value="native"/></parameters></task></tasks></updateObjectRequest>
